Schnittstelle UserService

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Interface for UserService, providing methods for managing and manipulating User objects.

  • Methodendetails

    • updateUser

      User updateUser(User user)
      Method to update a given User object.
      Parameter:
      user - The User object to be updated.
      Gibt zurück:
      The updated User object.

    • login

      User login(User loginUser)
      Method to log in a User with a given User object.
      Parameter:
      loginUser - The User object to be logged in.
      Gibt zurück:
      The logged in User object.

    • getUserById

      User getUserById(long userId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Method to retrieve a User by their ID.
      Parameter:
      userId - The ID of the User to be retrieved.
      Gibt zurück:
      The User object with the given ID.
      Löst aus:
      UserNotFoundException - if the User with the given ID is not found.

    • getUser

      User getUser(User user) throws UserNotFoundException
      Method to retrieve a User by their User object.
      Parameter:
      user - The User object to be retrieved.
      Gibt zurück:
      The User object with the given User object.
      Löst aus:
      UserNotFoundException - if the User with the given User object is not found.

    • delete

      User delete(User user)
      Method to delete a User.
      Parameter:
      user - The User object to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      The deleted User object.

    • addUser

      User addUser(User user) throws RuntimeException
      Method to add a new User.
      Parameter:
      user - The User object to be added.
      Gibt zurück:
      The added User object.
      Löst aus:
      RuntimeException - if a problem occurs while adding the User.

    • findAll

      List<User> findAll()
      Method to retrieve a list of all Users.
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of all User objects.

    • isUserValid

      void isUserValid(User user) throws RuntimeException
      Method to check if a given User is valid.
      Parameter:
      user - The User object to be checked.
      Löst aus:
      RuntimeException - if the User is not valid.
